title: Best Gragas skin idea ever?
body:
So, I was messing around with some friends is a pre-game lobby, and I noticed that there were no Gragas builds on lolnexus. So, I was confused as to why. I asked my friends and they said "Yeah, cuz nobody plays Gragas." Again I was confused. "Gragas is Swaggas", I say.

So here's the point I'm trying to make. Would it be possible/in Riot's best interests to make a Swaggas skin? Like, Gragas, but wearing a snapback that says "OBEY", a YOLO shirt, and sunglasses. Honestly, I'd buy that even if it cost 10000 RP. I mean, you made Brolaf, so I don't see why not. 

Please Riot. Make this a thing.

replies.body: That sounds like an awful idea to me, because I have no clue what you're talking about. It sounds like an idea that is going to age terribly, and not one that has already stood the test of time.

Well it goes without saying that this is a joke skin, and one that should be taken as such.

As for aging and whatnot, I see this skin living on for a long time, should it be made. You'd definitely see a lot of Swaggas players if it did lol
